title: Miniature Portrait of Miss Alberta Ridley
medium: watercolor on paper with gilt metal frame
provenance_text:
H. Agnes Ridley; Mrs. Alberta McLean, until 1939.  Gift to Carnegie Museum, Section of Archaeology and Ethnology, but immediately taken to Historical Society of Western Pennsylvania as indefinite loan on February 17, 1939; [transferred to AODA, 1957]; returned to CI for photography for National Portrait Gallery catalogue, 7/3-10/1979; returned to CMNH (Anthropology) February 1981; transferred from CMNH to HSWP, 1994/2000.

Alberta Ridley is the artist's daughter.

Family relationships:
James O'Hara
Mary O'Hara m. William Croghan
Mary O'Hara (daughter) m. C.W.H. Schenley
H. Agnes Schenley m. Charles Ridley (H. Agnes Ridley is artist)
Alberta Ridley m. Mr. McLean (Alberta McLean is donor)
